title: Can I delete some of these files under Profiles?
content: Hello, I ventured into the bowels of Profiles in Thunderbird and found I have these files. Is it safe to delete any of them? According to About:Profiles, gasu8cec is in use and 2 others are not, with no mention of the rest
creator: Tombarkas

title: problem synchronizing sent emails.
content:
I have recently set up an outlook email account with thuntherbird (default configuration), however I am having problems with the synchronization of sent emails.

When I set up the account, it did not sync any of the sent mail that I already had in my account.

When sending mail from thuntherbird, it does sync with the outlook server (if I log into the account from outlook I see the mail sent from thuntherbird), however if I send mail from outlook, it does not sync with Thuntherbird.

thank you for your help
creator: cortegazarraga

title: Sähköpostit eivät lähde
content: Sähköpostin lähettäminen ei onnistu. Kyseessä yrityksen tili ja viestit on pakko saada toimimaan. Lähtevän sähköpostin palvelin on smtp/tele.fi. Saatava pikaisesti toimimaan. t. Kirsi Pitkänen/Lentolan Kiinteistöhuolto Oy
creator: lentolan.kiinteistoh

title: new mail didn't support backgroud color
content: reply mail support backgroud color, but new mail didn't support backgroud color
creator: walkerxk

title: TB 115.1.0 new calendar entry has a shift of +9hrs
content:
When I create a new entry the calendar (TB 115.1.0) the entry is moved by 9hrs after sync with server.

If I enter an entry using my Mobile and talke a look in TB calendar, the entry is correct.

In Settings all timezones seems to be correct (System: UTC+1)

Any hints? Thanks for support, Christian
creator: christian.weber

title: Lost Emails on Upgrade
content: I upgraded from Thunderbird 102 to 115. All my emails disappeared. How do I get them back?
creator: lfreerock

title: Highlight/message bar is not working to select messages for me to read and or delete.
content: HI! Thanks for your help. When i open thunderbird, the blue message highlight bar appears, but soon dissapears and I dont know why its been like this for months, I have done an update, turned it on and off etc. Any ideas please? its on my laptop and I use windows. thanks so much
creator: heavyhorse
